solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int reverse(int x)--newline--    {--newline--        int result = 0;--newline--    --newline--        while (x != 0)--newline--        {--newline--            int tail = x % 10;--newline--            int newResult = result * 10 + tail;--newline--            if ((newResult - tail) / 10 != result)--newline--            { return 0; }--newline--            result = newResult;--newline--            x = x / 10;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--}
